rows: Handling of unused analog reference voltage supply pins.

VREFH and VREFH0:
→ These pins should not be left open. Connect them to analog power supply (AVCC).

VREFL and VREFL0:
→ These pins should not be left open. Connect them to analog ground (AVSS).
Handling of analog reference voltage supply pins which is used as GPIO.
N/A (For selected products, these are dedicated pins and are not multiplexed with GPIO's or other functions.)
